Articles.Content:
This completely made my day yesterday. Orchestral Manoeuvres in the Dark live @ Parkpop The Hague. I was there, front and centre.

Average age was closer to 50 than 40. I felt young again. ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif) Get ready for some a trip down memory lane.

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/LCKvxpQD4VI?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

<iframe width="480" height="270" src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/FiNMB93SO5g?feature=oembed" frameborder="0" allowfullscreen="true"></iframe>

(Not my recording. Just something I plucked from YT.)

**Edited <time datetime="2015-06-29T11:59:57Z" title="06/29/2015 11:59  AM" data-short="9 yr">June 29, 2015</time> by Tex\_NL**
